description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
65 Huddleston Road, Islington, London, N7 0AE

TPO Reference:
T1 – Lime of LBI TPO (No.121) 1991

PO Number:
T080319

Work Specifications:
1 x Lime (T1) as detailed in Plan of LBI TPO (No.121) 1991
Fell to ground level and treat stump
decision_conditions: Within two planting seasons of the removal of the Lime an alternative  replacement heavy standard tree shall be planted in a similar location with the front garden of  65 Huddleston Road subject to prior notification and approval or an alternative location outside the boundary subject to the written approval of the local planning authority.  The tree’s location, confirmation of the species, supplier and size shall notified in writing to the Principal Tree Preservation Officer within 30days of the replacement tree having been planted and shall be the subject of an establishment guarantee.
